author: Joe Flint
title: NBC Says Matt Lauer Investigation Found No Wrongdoing by Management
text:
An internal investigation by NBCUniversal has found no evidence that NBC News executives or senior management knew of any misconduct by “Today” show anchor Matt Lauer prior to a complaint in November of inappropriate behavior with a female colleague that led to his firing.
The report, a summary of which was released Wednesday morning, also determined that there isn’t believed to be a systemic culture of inappropriate behavior and sexual harassment at NBC News.
